com.itextpdf.text.pdf.codec
Class PngImage

java.lang.Object
  com.itextpdf.text.pdf.codec.PngImage

public class PngImage
extends Object

Reads a PNG image. All types of PNG can be read.

It is based in part in the JAI codec.

Author:
Paulo Soares
